Description: Replay Guitar Exchange is proud to present this Ibanez RG340, part of the Roadstar II series from the year 1998 and in a white color. Built with a basswood solidbody bolted to a maple Wizard neck, this Ibanez allows for freedom on the rosewood fingerboard with easy playability. A hum-single-single pickup configuration gives a wide arrange of tones, from heavy to real light, with an after-market Bill Lawrence L500XL added in the humbucker spot for a gripping heavy tone. This model is in Fair condition, with various scratches, dents and dings around the body and neck, and an estimated 85% of fret life remaining. Spring into action with this exquisite Ibanez RG340 electric guitar, available now at Replay Guitar Exchange! As always, feel free to contact our store for more details, or with any questions. Weight: 7 lbs. 9 oz. Neck material: maple Scale length: 25.5" Nut width: 1.675" Fingerboard radius: 14" Neck shape: Wizard Fingerboard material: rosewood Frets: 22, jumbo Country of origin: Korea Case not included Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Used 1998 Ibanez RG340, White
